technologies-list.name: jQuery
technologies-list.description: What would my life be without this library! DOM selection, events delegation, styling, plugins development.

technologies-list.name: Backbone
technologies-list.description: Even when I like Pasta, I prefer no spaghetti code. So my development is basesd on a well MVC/Router layers definition.

technologies-list.name: Less
technologies-list.description: I see Less like the next CSS version (CSS4). With variables, mixing, nesting and all you need to reuse your CSS.

technologies-list.name: Bootstrap
technologies-list.description: Nowadays with the variety of devices with internet access, I always program my applications to be used on mobiles, tables and desktop screens.

technologies-list.name: HTML5
technologies-list.description: Let's be semantic since the developers are also humans!

technologies-list.name: CSS3
technologies-list.description: Internet Explorer is my litmus test, if IE renders the application properly, that means I am doing the things well :-)

technologies-list.name: Apache
technologies-list.description: I have used this mature server since the beginning of time, on both PC and Mac.

technologies-list.name: Bower
technologies-list.description: Repositories and more repositories! I use Bower like an standard mechanism to interact with the Javascript universe.

technologies-list.name: Gulp
technologies-list.description: Concatenating, Uglifying, Minifying, JSlinting, Spriting, Refreshing. Is not this amazing!

technologies-list.name: React
technologies-list.description: A new and fun way to create my View layers.

technologies-component.title: The light side of the force
